description.value: You are descended from a janni or otherwise embody a dichotomy of opposing elemental planar forces. You gain the suli trait, in addition to the traits from your ancestry. You also gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Low-Light Vision], or you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Darkvision] if your ancestry already has low-light vision. You can choose from suli feats and feats from your ancestry whenever you gain an ancestry feat.
